Name: Lulu's Temple
About the game: Luluâ€™s Temple challenges you to venture inside a deep horrifying pyramid, filled with dangerous foes, traps and mysteries. Play as a badass archeologist who foolishly traps himself inside the temple by stumbling his way in. Use your powerful gun to blast the undead, and torch to light your path ahead. Features: Horrifying egyptic adventure filled with undead lurking in the dark. Interesting light mechanic that encourages player to tread carefully and make clever decisions. Badass shooting action filled with ultra badass pixel gore. Cool original soundtrack. Mysterious golden scarab companion. Ominous bastard guardian deep inside.
